plot: Olivia has a mutation that gives her unique superhuman abilities. She has been identified by The Corporation and an elite squad now surrounds her house to recruit her. Hugo, who seems to be a stranger, offers to help her escape.
title: Sssh!
plot_es: Olivia has a mutation that gives her unique superhuman abilities. She has been identified by The Corporation and an elite squad now surrounds her house to recruit her. Hugo, who seems to be a stranger, offers to help her escape.
plot_en: Olivia has a mutation that gives her unique superhuman abilities. She has been identified by The Corporation and an elite squad now surrounds her house to recruit her. Hugo, who seems to be a stranger, offers to help her escape.
